ud3.6:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud3.6:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:1.4_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
ud3.6:1.5_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
ud3.6:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
ud3.6:2.2_0: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena pilindavacchaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehi:
ud3.6:2.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.6:3.1_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā pilindavaccho tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.6:3.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
ud3.6:3.3_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, vaccha, bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarasī”ti?
ud3.6:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato pilindavacchassa pubbenivāsaṁ manasi karitvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
ud3.6:4.2_0: “mā kho tumhe, bhikkhave, vacchassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyittha.
ud3.6:4.3_0: Na, bhikkhave, vaccho dosantaro bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati.
ud3.6:4.4_0: Vacchassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañca jātisatāni abbokiṇṇāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātāni.
ud3.6:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
ud3.6:6.4_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti.
